Parameters.desc: The working mode of the light mix
items: The lighting information of each light is stored in a separate channel
The lighting information of each scene collection containing lights is placed in a separate channel. All lights that are not in any collection are stored in their individual render channels
Render channels are created based on the existing Light Select render elements in the scene. Lights that are not specified there are collected in a single render channel called Rest.

Parameters.desc: When enabled, illuminating materials are also included in the VFB Light Mix controls together with scene lights. The materials that V-Ray respects are: V-Ray Material with non-black self-illumination and V-Ray Light Material.
Enables the render element's denoising, provided the Denoiser render element is present.
